constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 81 (Tuesday, May 11, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. DEAN:
H.R. 3094.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H2195]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committees on Foreign Affairs, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Treasury Human Trafficking Coordinator Act
